list.name: Default
list.comment: Fixed error when clicking delete button and reset interval button when no item is selected

task.summary: Default task
Added basic UI
Added basic UI
Added communication with Knowledge Database
Added Tool controller enabling extracting zip files and converting from XMl to JSON
Implemented tools for extracting zip files and converting from XML to JSON
Minor UI changes
Merged loading of USPTO data into this project. Now loading of USPTO patent data can be initiated from the GUI.
Adding and deleting new sources records to the Knowledge database is now possible. Minor UI changes
Improved displaying of list box items to follow MVC pattern. Field isExpired was added.
Added owners to USPTO data. Refactoring of the json node preprocessing
Refactoring of transformation of the json files to be inserted into database to have the required structure. Top level now contains year, abstract, title, owners, authors
If the source is expired, warning icon with tooltip shows up
Added support for multiple mappings to the same field. The Mongo query is now run on collections specified in the body of the REST API request.
Refactoring of data loaders, added new patstat loader, not yet implemented
Added patent number for USPTO to be part of the final json
Added new main class for running the application as a console app
Added ability to edit existing records in the database
Tools for conversion and export are now run as a task on separate thread
Added resetting of expiration date of data sources. Added tests of GUI and the database using TestFX. Added comments
Added unit tests. minor refactor
Added loading from MAG Added icons to GUI
Fixed editing of sources category type
Added comments, reformatting of code
Added logging to file
Added loading of configuration of MongoDB connection from file system
Fixed error when clicking delete button and reset interval button when no item is selected
Added loading of Springer LOD data to Mongo
Improved loading of Springer LOD data
Added null checks to the Json Mapper and other fixes
Updated Uspto to use the new mapping methods. Fixed bugs in the mapping methods and refactoring
Added extraction of date field from patent data while loading to Mongo. Minor fixes
Fixed error when loading data to Mongo. Now empty fields are not added to the final json Added automatic adding of indexes in Mongo
Added logging info
